verses.verse: <S%G2658><s%> And He Arrived <S%G1161><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Derbe <S%G1191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lystra : <S%G3082><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Disciple <S%G3101><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> There, <S%G1563><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Jewish <S%G2453><s%> Believing <S%G4103><s%> <S%G3962><s%> But The Father <S%G1161><s%> A Greek, <S%G1672><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> Was Born Witness To <S%G3140><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%>

This One <S%G5126><s%> Wished <S%G2309><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Go Forth, <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> He Circumcised <S%G4059><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Were <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Those <S%G5117><s%> Places, <S%G1565><s%> They Know <S%G1492><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> All <S%G537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> His <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Greek <S%G1672><s%> He Was. <S%G5225><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> As <S%G1161><s%> They Passed Through <S%G1279><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> They Delivered <S%G3860><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> To Keep <S%G5442><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Decrees <S%G1378><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Decided On <S%G2919><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> Were Strengthened <S%G4732><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Abounded <S%G4052><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Number <S%G706><s%> ' Every <S%G2596><s%> Day. <S%G2250><s%>

Having Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Phrygia <S%G5435><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Galatian <S%G1054><s%> Country, <S%G5561><s%> Having Been Forbidden <S%G2967><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%>

Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Down <S%G2596><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Mysia <S%G3465><s%> They Attempted <S%G3985><s%> To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bithynia <S%G978><s%> To Go; <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Did <S%G3756><s%> Not Suffer <S%G1439><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>
And Having Passed <S%G3928><s%> By <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mysia <S%G3465><s%> They Came Down <S%G2597><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Troas. <S%G5174><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Vision <S%G3705><s%> During <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Appeared <S%G3700><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Paul : <S%G3972><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Of Macedonia <S%G3110><s%> Standing, <S%G2476><s%> Beseeching <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Having Passed Over <S%G1224><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> Help <S%G997><s%> Us. <S%G2254><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vision <S%G3705><s%> He Saw, <S%G1492><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> We Sought <S%G2212><s%> To Go <S%G1831><s%> Forth <S%G1519><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> Concluding <S%G4822><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Had Called <S%G4341><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> To Announce The Glad Tidings To <S%G2097><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

Having Sailed <S%G321><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> We Came With A Straight Course <S%G2113><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Samothrace, <S%G4543><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> On The <S%G5037><s%> Following Day <S%G1966><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Neapolis, <S%G3496><s%>

<S%G1564><s%> And Thence <S%G5037><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is The <S%G2076><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Of That <S%G3588><s%> Part <S%G3310><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> A Colony. <S%G2862><s%> <S%G1510><s%> And We Were <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Staying <S%G1304><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Certain. <S%G5100><s%>

And On <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G5037><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> We Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> A River, <S%G4215><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> Was Customary <S%G3543><s%> Prayer <S%G4335><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sat Down <S%G2523><s%> We Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Who Came Together <S%G4905><s%> Women. <S%G1135><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Lydia, <S%G3070><s%> A Seller Of Purple <S%G4211><s%> Of The City <S%G4172><s%> Of Thyatira, <S%G2363><s%> Who Worshipped <S%G4576><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Was Hearing; <S%G191><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Opened <S%G1272><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> To Attend <S%G4337><s%> To The Things <S%G3588><s%> Spoken <S%G2980><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul. <S%G3972><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> She Was Baptized <S%G907><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Her <S%G3624><s%> House <S%G846><s%> She Besought <S%G3870><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Ye Have Judged <S%G2919><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> My <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> House, <S%G3450><s%> Abide. <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Constrained <S%G3849><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4198><s%> As We Were Going <S%G2257><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Prayer, <S%G4335><s%> A Damsel <S%G3814><s%> Certain, <S%G5100><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of Python, <S%G4436><s%> Met <S%G528><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Gain <S%G2039><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Brought <S%G3930><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Masters <S%G2962><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> By Divining. <S%G3132><s%>

She <S%G3778><s%> Having Followed <S%G2628><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Cried <S%G2896><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Most High <S%G5310><s%> Are, <S%G1526><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Announce <S%G2605><s%> , To Us The <S%G2254><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Of Salvation. <S%G4991><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> And This <S%G1161><s%> She Did <S%G4160><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%> Being Distressed <S%G1278><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Turned <S%G1994><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> I Charge <S%G3853><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> To Come Out <S%G1831><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Came Out <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G846><s%> Same <S%G3588><s%> Hour. <S%G5610><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Seeing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Matters <S%G2962><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Was Gone <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Gain, <S%G2039><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Having Taken Hold Of <S%G1949><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> They Dragged Them <S%G1670><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Market <S%G58><s%> Before <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magistrates; <S%G758><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Brought Up <S%G4317><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Captains <S%G4755><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Exceedingly Trouble <S%G1613><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Announce <S%G2605><s%> Customs <S%G1485><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> It Is Not <S%G3756><s%> Lawful <S%G1832><s%> For Us <S%G2254><s%> To Receive <S%G3858><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> To Do, <S%G4160><s%> Romans <S%G4514><s%> Being. <S%G5607><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Rose Up Together <S%G4911><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Captains <S%G4755><s%> Having Torn Off <S%G4048><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Garments <S%G2440><s%> Commanded <S%G2753><s%> To Beat Them With Rods. <S%G4463><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> And Many <S%G5037><s%> Having Laid <S%G2007><s%> On Them <S%G846><s%> Stripes <S%G4127><s%> They Cast Them <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> Charging <S%G3853><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jailor <S%G1200><s%> Safely <S%G806><s%> To Keep <S%G5083><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> A Charge <S%G3852><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Having Received <S%G2983><s%> Thrust <S%G906><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inner <S%G2082><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Secured <S%G805><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stocks. <S%G3586><s%>

<S%G2596><s%> And Towards <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Midnight <S%G3317><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> Praying <S%G4336><s%> Were Singing Praises To <S%G5214><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Listened To <S%G1874><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prisoners. <S%G1198><s%>

<S%G869><s%> And Suddenly <S%G1161><s%> Earthquake <S%G4578><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Great, <S%G3173><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Were Shaken <S%G4531><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Foundations <S%G2310><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prison, <S%G1201><s%> Were Opened <S%G455><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> Immediately <S%G3916><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doors <S%G2374><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bonds <S%G1199><s%> Were Loosed. <S%G447><s%>

<S%G1853><s%> And Awoke Out Of Sleep <S%G1161><s%> Being <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jailor, <S%G1200><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doors <S%G2374><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> Having Drawn <S%G4685><s%> A Sword <S%G3162><s%> Was About <S%G3195><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> To Put To Death, <S%G337><s%> Supposing <S%G3543><s%> Had Escaped <S%G1628><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prisoners. <S%G1198><s%>

<S%G5455><s%> But Called Out <S%G1161><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> No <S%G3367><s%> Do <S%G4238><s%> To Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Injury; <S%G2556><s%> All <S%G537><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> We Are <S%G2070><s%> Here. <S%G1759><s%>

Having Asked <S%G154><s%> For And <S%G1161><s%> Lights <S%G5457><s%> He Rushed In, <S%G1530><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1790><s%> Trembling <S%G1096><s%> Fell Down Before <S%G4363><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Silas. <S%G4609><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Brought <S%G4254><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Out <S%G1854><s%> He Said, <S%G5346><s%> Sirs, <S%G2962><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is Necessary <S%G3165><s%> For Me <S%G1163><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May Be Saved? <S%G4982><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> , Christ <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4982><s%> Thou Shalt Be Saved, <S%G4771><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thy <S%G3624><s%> House. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House. <S%G3614><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G3880><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> He Washed Them <S%G3068><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stripes; <S%G4127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Baptized <S%G907><s%> He <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Immediately. <S%G3916><s%>

<S%G321><s%> And Having Brought <S%G5037><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> , His <S%G846><s%> He Laid <S%G3908><s%> A Table For Them <S%G5132><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exulted <S%G21><s%> With All His House, <S%G3832><s%> Having Believed <S%G4100><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2250><s%> And Day <S%G1161><s%> Having Come <S%G1096><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Captains <S%G4755><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Serjeants, <S%G4465><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let Go <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Those <S%G444><s%> Men. <S%G1565><s%>

<S%G518><s%> And Reported <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jailor <S%G1200><s%> These <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Words <S%G5128><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3972><s%> Paul, <S%G3754><s%> Have Sent <S%G649><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Captains <S%G4755><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Be Let Go. <S%G630><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Depart <S%G4198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Peace. <S%G1515><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Said <S%G5346><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Beaten <S%G1194><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Publicly <S%G1219><s%> <S%G1219><s%> Uncondemned, <S%G178><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Romans <S%G4514><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%> They Cast Us <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Secretly <S%G2977><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Do They Thrust Out? <S%G1544><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Indeed, <S%G1063><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Themselves <S%G846><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Let Them Bring Out. <S%G1806><s%>

<S%G312><s%> And Reported <S%G1161><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Captains <S%G4755><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Serjeants <S%G4465><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> These. <S%G5023><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Afraid <S%G5399><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Romans <S%G4514><s%> They Are. <S%G1526><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> They Besought <S%G3870><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Brought Out <S%G1806><s%> They Asked Them <S%G2065><s%> To Go Out <S%G1831><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City. <S%G4172><s%>

<S%G1831><s%> And Having Gone Forth <S%G1161><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison <S%G5438><s%> They Came <S%G1525><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lydia; <S%G3070><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> They Exhorted <S%G3870><s%> , Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Away. <S%G1831><s%>
